name: GTC-Car-Run
description:
Grand Theft Auto is an open world action-adventure video game released first for the PlayStation. It was the first instalment of the Grand Theft Auto series. On this app, get ready, follow the instructions and show your driving skills on GTC-Car-Run.
Got an idea or any feedback to improve the gameplay?
Let us know on the comments below :)

Yes, there are loads of improvements and new features can be added for this app.
What do you think it would be great to have first on next releases?

Some suggestions from users:
- Be able to set different cities
- Change music background
- Change car’s colour
- Hearts life during the game play
- Collect special Bonus
- Paid App version with no ads ($0.99)
- Improve FPS performance
- High-resolution graphics


Your feedback is very important to us :)
